title: Reus [R.G. Mechanics] 1.3.0 (Repack?)
description:
Version 1.3.0
Latest version (at least until now, 25.07.2014)

Alternate version here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10629703

Unlike the alternate version, I have no idea where this one saves your achievements, but you start with no achievements, unlike the alternate version.


Savegames and the configuration file are saved in: My DocumentsReus


The GOG version saved achievements as well save
games and configs in a file in:
My DocumentsReus

Unfortunately, I haven't found a GOG version updated to 1.3.0
I recommend the alternate version, but if you don't care about modifying your achievements, you can get this one. It's easier to set up at first.

I got it from here:
